summary: This document describes a photograph taken by Jeffrey Epstein in 2014, showing a Polish model meeting with several of Epstein's VIP connections, including Ehud Barak, Woody Allen, and Bill Gates at various locations.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: He is described as having photographed a Polish model during meetings with his VIP connections in 2014.

persons.name: Ehud Barak
persons.context: He is shown meeting with the Polish model at Epstein's townhouse in the photograph.

persons.name: Woody Allen
persons.context: He is shown meeting with the Polish model at Epstein's townhouse in the photograph.

persons.name: Bill Gates
persons.context: He is shown meeting with the Polish model at his office near Seattle in the photograph.

connections.description: Epstein photographed Barak meeting with a model at his townhouse, indicating a social connection.
Epstein photographed Allen meeting with a model at his townhouse, indicating a social connection.
Epstein photographed Gates meeting with a model at Gates's office, indicating a social connection.

events.title: Photograph of Model with VIPs
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein photographed a Polish model meeting with several of his VIP connections, including Ehud Barak and Woody Allen at his townhouse, and Bill Gates at Gates's office.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein photographed a Polish model in 2014 during meetings with his VIP connections.
The photograph shows the model meeting with former Israeli Prime Minister Ehud Barak at Epstein's townhouse.
The photograph also shows the model meeting with filmmaker Woody Allen at Epstein's townhouse.
Additionally, the photograph shows the model meeting with billionaire Bill Gates at his office near Seattle.
